rComments: Worst professor I have ever encountered. She seems to be a sweet person, but she simply should not be a professor. It's not fair to students who actually want to be engaged & learn. I did get an A in the class, but that's not the point - you can get an A whether the class is engaging or terrible. Let's keep the quality of our education up. Not this

She sucked!!! made attendance mandatory but class had nothing to do with our paper, it was boring and if she found you on a cell phone or computer you would be kicked out, reminded me of high school. Also the head TA Jin was horrible, extremely mean and not helpful. if she didnt like your topic she would not even bother to help

I didn't learn anything from her class. She always canceled class for no apparent reason and it was upon numerous times, which I'm pretty sure was fine by the students but unprofessional on her part. She never went through the exams we would have and was quite horrible at explaining concepts. If anything, trust the TAs. They'll know what to do.

Everyone complains that she isn't very helpful and I agree. I went to her office hours to ask her a question and all she did was stare at me like she was lost. Uh, hello? She is very vague and not very clear, she assumes you know what's up. She's the only one who teaches 103B, so good luck.

This class was really easygoing, sometimes I forgot I was even enrolled in it (probably due to the number of class cancellations/holidays). The rubrics for grading are strangely simple. Write a thesis at the end of the first paragraph and cite a lot of authors with proper ASA formatting. Trust me, you'll be good to go.

Horrible class. didnt learn anything...notes were rarely taken or GIVEN. talked a lot about her daily activities and did not focus on subject material. midterm was absurd and her curve was unfair... stay away from her classes

Sandoval seems to be a nice person and Methods is probably a hard class to teach, but she is so vague about assignments and it seems like she tries to avoid answering questions by saying "Come see me", not mention she told the class she doesn't respond to emails. I would suggest that she try teaching something less confusing.

Sandoval as a person is beautiful, articulate, very stylish, and kind. Her class was fairly boring. I recommend engaging her in conversations&class debates during lecture to stay awake. She was fairly vague about what she expected from her students essays&then she turned around and graded us very hard.assignments-midterm essay&study of public space
Sandoval is great--she knows her stuff. 103B is hard to teach to such a large class. Esthela(TA) was amazing--great feedback.  I got an A in the class.

Lots of whiners rating Sandoval. She's great, actually. 103B is a tough, tedious class but she made it cut and dry, to the point. Students were awful to her. I doubt anyone could make this class fun.  I admire her for hanging in there.

Her lecture is a waste of time, she goes through her slide way too fast like she's rushing to get things over with. There is no use copying notes cuz after she finish reading off the slides, it goes...on my notes,onto the next slide.She is not professor material (far from it & not trying).does not apreciate studnt opinion about her teaching style.

IT was obvious that nobody wants to be in her class if it weren't for the mandatory attendance. tat took her a while to notice.. EVery lecture she make big fusses saying students are distractin her class by ragging them out, when really she was the distraction to our education. her use of classtime means vending out her daily frustration on us.

She is constantly telling us to not waste our time in her class when really she was wasting ours.  She is underprepared to teach and is always acting like she is doing us a favor by teaching.  She cancels class and does not show up to office hours.  She means well but should probably stick to research instead of teaching.

She's obviously a very smart woman; however, she is not trained for her position. She rarely gave lectures, and when she did they were condescending and dumbed down. Most of the time she had the students discuss the material. The textbooks sucked. Waste of time and money- don't take a class taught by her, you'll only be disappointed.
I had to work hard just to stay awake. She's okay, but I think she isn't ready for her position.

She's a very energetic and interesting professor, but her tests are non-specific and lead one to write too much and run out of time. Class discussions are interesting and helpful, and the project we completed was useful. A great addition to the faculty!
